Hi Everyone,

I am running a suite of tests from command line on Linux and =
when I ran the tests and as expected at run time an output is printed on th=
e command line. This output isn't just the number of tests failed/successfu=
l/ignored and time lapse, but it is the output generated by the tests and j=
unit at run time.

I would like to redirect the output to a file, I am look=
ing at the junit source code (as a good boyscout) and the only classes I co=
uld find that MAYBE print on the console is junit.textui.ResultPrinter but =
it prints the results of the tests.
My question is:
Are there any classes i=
n the source code that prints output on the command line? (If yes, what are=
 they?)

Thank you for your time
